channel.title: Help me u lazy people!
channel.description: ok i have a modem ARRIS and i dont need to portforward. every time i ask someone they say "With a modem u dont need to portforward" and im sick of that answer cause it doenst help me at all.. if i dont need to portforward what do i do?? im really confused. how to i get my server open to public? Thanks for help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 08:49:47 pm[/size][hr]I also need help on giving myself owner on my server. when i chat it says nothing beside my name :S

item.title: Help me u lazy people!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

They should.
There are only 2000 of them

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

Most of the portforwarding tutorials should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me u lazy people!
item.dc:creator: @Skw33ky Skw33ky
item.description:
@Skw33ky wrote:

Not the best solution to the first problem, but you can try using hamachi instead of no-ip. Should make your server open to the public. For the second question, it depends on your source.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me u lazy people!
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

if u dont need to portforward you probably just need to get a no-ip then put that as your server ip in the clients gui.java then upload it.

for the owner status you just go to characters open ur file and replace character rights with 3 just make sure your logged out and save before you log back in

hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Help me u lazy people!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

For owner thing go to characters then changer ure player rights to 3 i think

Read full topic
